metadata.title: CVE-2024-28245 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: KaTeX is a JavaScript library for TeX math rendering on the web. KaTeXusers who render untrusted mathematical expressions could encountermalicious input using `\includegraphics` that runs arbitrary JavaScript, orgenerate invalid HTML. Upgrade to KaTeX v0.16.10 to remove thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: node-katex package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
